personalInfo.splInterest: Art, following the stock markets, working out, reading, anything outdoors, the beach and traveling

tourBios.exmtStatus: Conditional - Finished T58 at 2015 Web.com Tour Qualifying Tournament
tourBios.carHigh:
2015: Made the cut in all nine starts on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA TOUR Canada. Had four top 10s and seven top 25s. Best finish was a T9 at the Staal Foundation Open in July. Finished T10 three times in a four-week stretch after that. Was 31st on the final Order of Merit...Made two Web.com Tour starts, missing the cut at the United Leasing Championship and T36 at the Nova Scotia Open. Prior to 2015 had not made any starts in PGA TOUR-sanctioned events.

2014: Finished T64 at the Web.com Tour Qualifying Tournament in December.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Won the 2014 Met Amateur Championship in the New York City area. Qualified T7 in stroke play in the 112th championship and defeated the top two medalists en route to the title. Beat Matt Lowe 3 and 1 in the finals, closing things out with a walk-off hole-in-one...Named the 2014 MGA Player of the Year...Was two-time conference player of the year in high school and was the state player of the year in 2010, his senior year.
tourBios.personal: Attended Greenwich (Conn.) High School, the same school that produced Pro Football Hall of Famer Steve Young...Has two brothers who play college golf, at the University of Connecticut (Stephen) and the University of Hartford (Paul)...Earliest golf memory was his dad teaching him a swing at PGA National...Says if he weren't playing golf, he'd be working on Wall Street. Says, "I'd like the competitive environment." ...First tee entrance song would be "Iron on Me" by Gucci Mane...Favorite course he's played is Winged Foot. Would also like to play St. Andrews and Valderrama...Other favorites include the University of Virginia, the New York Yankees, Knicks and Rangers (sports teams), Tom Brady, Derek Jeter and Arnold Schwarzenegger (non-golfers), Candy Crush Saga (app), Cucci Mane (entertainer), "Dumb and Dumber" (movie), "King of Queens" (TV show), Japanese Hibachi, watches and pocket knives...Played golf with Donald Trump in the summer of 2014 at his course in New Jersey...Would like to trade places for a day with President Obama ("would like to be president.")...Dream foursome includes his dad and two brothers...Would like to live in New York someday...Twitter name is @dp_pastore.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Web.com Tour was T36th in 2015 at the Nova Scotia Open.
